# BillboardComponent

**Structure**

A component that orients an entity instance so that it continuously points toward the active camera.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BillboardComponent
```

## Overview

The `BillboardComponent` automatically adjusts an entity’s orientation so that its z-axis keeps pointing in the direction of the main camera in a RealityKit scene.

Add a `BillboardComponent` to any entity by passing it to an entity’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity/ComponentSet/set(_:)-8sii2] method.

```swift
entity.components.set(BillboardComponent())
```

The entity immediately reorients itself so that it faces the scene’s active camera.





For an example of how to animate [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BillboardComponent/blendFactor], see [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BillboardAction].

## Initializers

- **init()**: Creates a billboard component that points an entity’s positive z-axis directly toward the active camera.

## Instance Properties

- **blendFactor**: The degree at which the entity rotates toward the camera.

## Visual adjustments

- **HoverEffectComponent**: A component that applies a visual effect to a hierarchy of entities when a person looks at or selects an entity.
- **EnvironmentBlendingComponent**: A component that controls how an entity blends visually with objects in the local environment.
- **LensDistortionData**: A description of estimated lens distortion that can be used to rectify images.
- **ImagePresentationComponent**: A component that supports general image presentation.

## Conforms To

- Component
- Copyable
